name: Juju on the Beat Challenge Descendants Dress-up
name_original: Juju on the Beat Challenge Descendants Dress-up
description:
If You love JuJu Descendants Girl. She'll back!! Everyone loves dress up games.. But they get boring. This is not your usual dress up game.

JuJu Descendants Girl dress-up and salon with high fashion dresses!
The combinations allow for seemingly endless fun!

Features:
- 8 JuJu Descendants Girl Character
- 14 Magic stuff
- 15 Dresses
- 20 Hair
- 15 symbol
- 19 pants
- 6 backgrounds settings
- that's over 4500000 combinations!
- Hours of entertainment
